JoNina Abron-Ervin is a veteran social justice activist, an author, and a journalist. She was a member of the Black Panther Party for nearly a decade.
JoNina Abron-Ervin, '70, joined the Black Panther Party in 1972 in Detroit, Michigan, and later worked for its headquarters in Oakland, California.
